EmailTemplate.description: Notification for the user that has been added to a community but not logged-in for 30 days.
EmailTemplate.name: Trade Community - 30 Days Deactivation Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Target_User.FirstName} Reminder, please complete your registration for ITA's Market Intelligence Tool
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Target_User.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your information to register for the International Trade Administration's customer community. In order to allow you access to save market research and create your customized reports, we invite you to verify your email address and log in to change your password. Failure to validate your account information will de-activate in 15 days. Unfortunately, once this happens, you will need to start the process again. A wealth of research and opportunities await you! Confirm your information, log in, and start exploring.
